bug.author: again4you
bug.summary: [PPA] nnstreamer Daily build failure on launchpad.net
bug.description:
Because of version number issue, nnstreamer failed to build on launchpad.net. Detailed log is as below.
PPA recipe: https://code.launchpad.net/~nnstreamer/+recipe/nnstreamer-daily
DEBUG Considering changefile 100128/ubuntu/nnstreamer_0.0.3-0~201810230646~ubuntu18.04.1_source.changes DEBUG Finding fresh policy INFO Processing upload nnstreamer_0.0.3-0~201810230646~ubuntu18.04.1_source.changes INFO Upload was rejected: INFO nnstreamer_0.0.3-0~201810230646~ubuntu18.04.1.dsc: Version older than that in the archive. 0.0.3-0~201810230646~ubuntu18.04.1 <= 2018.6.15-0~201810151022~ubuntu18.04.1 INFO Committing the transaction and any mails associated with this upload.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/693>#693</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

After removing the previous debian package which has wrong version name, nnstreamer succeeded to build without any errors. You can see the result at below site.
https://launchpad.net/~nnstreamer/+archive/ubuntu/ppa
